item.title: [GROOVY-10121] @AnnotationCollector does not work with JUnit 5
item.description:
Following exception is thrown when trying to build project with JUnit 5 where `@AnnotationCollector` is used at any `@interface` in `/src/test/groovy`:

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
This is a workaround for this issue:

test {
    useJUnitPlatform()

    // workaround for https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/GROOVY-10121
    exclude '**/*$CollectorHelper*'
}
Thanks for spotting the issue. It should be fixed for the next releases.
